name: Copper Kettle Tavern
description: Warm firelight. Clinking mugs. Low conversations blend with lute music. Smell of roasted meat.
initialState: A cozy tavern with a large copper kettle hanging over the hearth. Tables scattered throughout.

name: Central Fountain
description: The heart of Market Square, where water sparkles in the sunlight and people gather.
initialState: An ornate fountain with clear water. Benches around the edges where people rest.

name: Marcus's Stall
description: A well-organized merchant stall displaying various goods and wares.
initialState: Neat rows of merchandise. Marcus arranging his display with practiced efficiency.

name: North Road Entrance
description: The guarded entrance to the north road, currently blocked by city guards.
initialState: Guards in uniform stand watch, checking papers and questioning travelers.

name: Lord Aldwin's Manor
description: An imposing manor house with high walls and formal gardens.
initialState: Pristine gardens and marble steps leading to an ornate door. Guards patrol the perimeter.

name: Lord Blackwood's Estate
description: A grand estate known for hosting influential gatherings and political dealings.
initialState: Impressive architecture with tall windows. The sound of a fountain echoes from within.

name: Various Shops
description: A row of shops selling everything from spices to leather goods.
initialState: Busy shopkeepers calling out their wares. The smell of various goods mingles in the air.

name: Willow Bend
description: A peaceful bend in the river road, shaded by ancient willow trees.
initialState: Dappled sunlight through willow branches. The river flows quietly nearby.
